official_title: A bill to establish the Crisis Management Council for the purpose of studying international political, economic, and military happenings, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Crisis Management Council within the Department of State. Authorizes the Council to make recommendations to: (1) prevent an international crisis from occurring; and (2) manage and reduce it should it occur. Declares that the President should invite any similar organization established by the Soviet Union to meet periodically with the Council. Authorizes the President to invite other nations if the Council agrees.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Crisis Management Council for the purpose of studying international political, economic, and military happenings, and for other purposes.
